APIs for Stock data - 
Alphavantage = 4TIO4KLV3YZPT1HW
yahoo-stock-prices - npm
yahoo-finance - npm historical
stock-info - npm

---------------------------------------------------------
Steps to run all services - 
node index.mjs

Steps to run ui-service - 
node index.js
